document.full_text: french judges may seek more time to decide on opening an inquiry into finance minister christine lagarde's role in a 2008 arbitration payout, meaning allegations of misconduct could hang over her bid to head the imf.
document.title: inquiry threat may linger for imf hopeful lagarde
lines_and_colors: french judges may seek more time to decide on opening an inquiry into finance minister christine lagarde's role in a 2008 arbitration payout, meaning allegations of misconduct could hang over her bid to head the imf.
